status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

components.name: Appcelerator Modules
components.description: Please enter tickets related to Modules here.

fields.description:
Hi Team,

This is Divyansh Sharma and I am trying to  develop iOS Module for App-dynamic, So i have some query about this which mention below:

* How to use the iOS  libraries  in the appcelerator module which supports the framework of appdynamics.  Is it possible to add a iOS native library in appcelerator titanium ?

* Is there any support for appdynamics in appcelerator Titanium ?  

* Is there any module for the appdynamics in appcelerator?


Kindly help me to resolve the above query.

Thanks & Regards
Divyansh Sharma

comments.body:
We don't have an official module distributed for App Dynamics . You can develop a module .. please refer these 

https://docs.axway.com/bundle/Titanium_SDK_allOS_en/page/titanium_module_concepts.html
http://docs.appcelerator.com/platform/latest/#!/guide/Hyperloop
https://docs.axway.com/bundle/Appcelerator_Studio_allOS_en/page/creating_a_new_titanium_module.html
